description.narrative: The project, involving USD 170 million in CTF loan and USD 5 million in CTF grant, intends to provide financial intermediation loan to Punjab National Bank in order to develop: (i) a comprehensive institutional capacity and market development program, and (ii) a designated solar rooftop financing facility to provide debt financing, in order to support 400 MW of solar rooftop capacity on commercial, industrial and public buildings.
